variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Subject's sample use. Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Seq_DNA_Exome_Target: Targeted exome sequencing; Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing; Seq_DNA_WholeGenome: Whole genome sequencing; Seq_RNA: Whole transcriptome sequencing
